summary: The diff implements a migration system to populate sample data but does not verify/fix the existing getProducts() and getCategories() methods as required. Frontend changes (REQ-5, REQ-6) are completely missing. The migration approach only creates 1 sample product instead of 3-5, and product prices don't match the specified range.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify and fix the data fetching for products in the backend main.mo getProducts() method to ensure it returns all stored products from the products HashMap
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows backend/main.mo was modified but truncated. No evidence of verifying or fixing the getProducts() method logic. The migration approach doesn't address potential issues in the existing getProducts() implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify and fix the data fetching for categories in the backend main.mo getCategories() method to ensure it returns all stored categories from the categories HashMap
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows backend/main.mo was modified but truncated. No evidence of verifying or fixing the getCategories() method logic. The migration approach doesn't address potential issues in the existing getCategories() implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: If the products HashMap is empty, populate it with sample products including at least one product in the 'Mobiles' category with realistic data
missing_requirements.reason: Migration only creates 1 sample product (iPhone 13 at price 99900) instead of the required 3-5 products. Price is outside the specified range of 10,000-50,000. Insufficient sample data provided.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the HomePage's Featured Products section (first 8 products) successfully fetches and displays products using the useGetProducts hook
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend files were modified in the diff. No evidence of changes to HomePage or verification of useGetProducts hook functionality.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the HomePage's Shop by Category section successfully fetches and displays all categories using the useGetCategories hook
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend files were modified in the diff. No evidence of changes to HomePage or verification of useGetCategories hook functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module with data migration logic
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires verification and fixing of existing getProducts()/getCategories() methods and conditional population of sample data. A migration system with a separate migration.mo module was not requested. The requirement was to check if HashMaps are empty and populate them directly, not create a migration framework.
